system.description:
The character is a uni

versity student who is has not yet taken a degree. He is typically between 14 and 16 years old and somewhere along his university program. He receives 30 experience points per finished year that he can apply to Latin or Artes Liberales. If he has finished his second year of studies, he is in the liminal position of either applying for work or continuing his education. Female characters can only take this Virtue if they are studying to be physicians at Salerno, although the Paid Rights Virtue would allow them to take this Virtue elsewhere. However, at other universities they would not be able to graduate.

 

More than half of all university students are

Simple Student

s.
